Palatine.The Streets of Woodfield: The Streets of Woodfield is a shopping center located at I-290 and Higgins Rd. in Schaumburg, Illinois, directly across from Woodfield Mall. McCaffery Interests, a Chicago-based real estate developer, rebuilt the mall into the present-day configuration as a shopping and entertainment mall anchored by Carson's, GameWorks, Dick's Sporting Goods, and the 20-screen AMC Loews Streets of Woodfield 20.
